title: Achieving lasting remission for HIV
author: Andrea Teagle, Knowable Magazine
summary_long: Around the world, some 40 million people are living with HIV. And though progress in treatment means the infection isn’t the death sentence it once was, researchers have never been able to bring about a cure. Instead, HIV-positive people must take a cocktail of antiretroviral drugs for the rest of their lives. But in 2025, researchers reported a breakthrough that suggests that a “functional” cure for HIV—a way to keep HIV under control long-term without constant treatment—may indeed be possible. Source: arstechnica.com. Date: 2025-11-29. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: consumer:theres a cute voice messaging app for playdate now:2025-11-29T22:36:20.000Z
title: There's a cute voice messaging app for Playdate now
author: Cheyenne MacDonald
summary_long: If your friend group or family happens to include multiple Playdate owners, there's now a cute way to chat amongst yourselves right within the device. Jon Simantov, the developer who gave us Cranky Cove, has released an app called helloyellow where you can send voice messages, create group chats and share achievements with anyone you've added as a friend. It's available to download from itch.io for free, with some limitations, or $5 to get the full version. Now, excuse me while I lament being the only person in my circle with a passion for weird little gadgets. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2025-11-29. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: consumer:team cherry is working on more silksong content but wont say:2025-11-29T19:06:06.000Z
title: Team Cherry is working on more Silksong content but won't say when it'll release
author: Jackson Chen
summary_long: Only roughly 15 percent of Hollow Knight: Silksong players have earned the 100 percent completion achievement, according to SteamDB. For the remaining percentage, there may still be plenty of time to finish the game before Team Cherry announces new content for the hit side-scrolling game. As first revealed by Bloomberg's Jason Schreier, the development team confirmed that it's working on a content update that could be similar in scale to the Hollow Knight: Godmaster DLC. According to the report, the new content could feature Steel Assassin Sharpe, a mysterious character that was teased several years ago but never made an official in-game appearance. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2025-11-29. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

title: Airbus orders software fix to thousands of planes due to solar radiation risk
author: Anthony Ha
summary_long: Flights were delayed and cancelled globally after Airbus ordered fixes to 6,000 of its A320 series planes, according to The Guardian. id: consumer:passengers face disruption as airbus updates thousands of pl:2025-11-29T07:05:43.000Z
title: Passengers face disruption as Airbus updates thousands of planes
author: Mariella Moon
summary_long: An Airbus directive that ordered the immediate software update for 6,000 A320 planes has lead to flight disruptions around the world. As Reuters notes, that’s more than half of the 11,300 A320 jets in operation. The narrow-body A320 is widely used globally, but its largest operator is American Airlines, which has 480 of the model in its fleet. American Airlines said 340 planes out of the 480 it has need to be updated, with each plane taking two hours, during one of the busiest weekends for travel in the US. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2025-11-29. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: nextfrontiers:researchers develop new algorithms for the efficient design :2025-11-29T15:30:04.000Z
title: Researchers develop new algorithms for the efficient design of motorcycles in the digital environment
summary_long: Researchers at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (UC3M) have developed a set of innovative methods and algorithms that improve the performance and precision of vehicle design through topological optimization, a mathematical technique that allows designs to be optimized by distributing materials efficiently. The results of the research, which these scientists have applied to the design of parts for a competition motorcycle to reduce its weight while maintaining performance, could have a major impact on sectors such as the automotive and aeronautics industries. Source: techxplore.com. Date: 2025-11-29. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.
